items.name: Ventor's Gamble
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff which can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

70% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take 2209 Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, regardless of whether that skill deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 38% more Area Damage
Supported Skills have 30% less Area of Effect
Supported Skills have 8% reduced Enemy Stun Threshold
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Support, Totem, Spell, AoE, Fire, Projectile, Trigger

Totems from Supported Skills gain the Avenging Flame
Skill and Trigger it when Hit by an Enemy

explicitMods: Deals base Fire Damage equal to 134% of Totem's Maximum Life
Totems with this Skill Trigger it when Hit by an Enemy
hybrid.secDescrText: Launches a fiery projectile high into the air, to drop on a target and deal area damage where it lands.

explicitMods: 52% increased Critical Strike Chance during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Chimeric Relic
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Divination Card items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
7% increased Quantity of Items dropped in Heists
10% increased Rarity of Items dropped in Heists
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.name: Loath Crown
implicitMods: 9% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
craftedMods: 45% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Slain Rare or Unique Enemies

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 44 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 725 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Divination Distillate
explicitMods: 12% increased Quantity of Items found during Effect
30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: Knowledge is fermented in pain and loss
Distilled with reflection
To quench the thirst of those
who dream of enlightenment

items.name: Hyrri's Ire
explicitMods: 134 to 191 Added Cold Damage with Bow Attacks
flavourText: Hyrri loosed a barrage of arrows,
tipped with a poisoned hatred
only oppression can ferment.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2575 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 29% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
You and nearby allies have +15% chance to Evade Attack Hits
Suppressed Spell Damage dealt to you is Unlucky
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that grants you and your allies additional chance to evade attacks, and makes suppressed spell damage unlucky against you.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
Your and nearby Allies' Damage Penetrates 1% Elemental Resistances
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 141% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 16% increased Movement Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Attack Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Damages enemies in an area, applying a debuff for a short duration. If a non-unique enemy dies while affected by the debuff, the enemy's corpse will be consumed to summon a Sentinel of Absolution for a longer secondary duration, or to refresh the duration and life of an existing one instead if you have the maximum number of them.
explicitMods: 25% chance to Summon a Sentinel of Absolution on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy
This Spell and Minions Convert 50% of Physical Damage to Lightning Damage

items.name: Headhunter
explicitMods: 30% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for 60 seconds
flavourText: "A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
